name: Fishdox
tag_list: sales, forecasting, crm, file-sharing, file-storage, sales-automation
overview:
What is Fishdox?

Fishdox enables sales people to manage deals, share customer files, and develop a forecast based on file tracking and real-time deal updates.

Stay Organized Manage and access all customer facing documents anytime, anywhere.

Share with Customers Securely share large files that can be viewed in the cloud.

Track and Forecast Develop your forecast based on file tracking and real-time Fishdox deal updates.

Become a sales rock star. Fishdox.com
